channel.title: blender on Thoughts on GameDev
channel.description: Recent content in blender on Thoughts on GameDev

item.title: Weapon Models Update
item.description: Some renders of a couple of the weapons that got banged out in between coding sessions last week in case you missed it: #screenshotsaturday #indiegames Weapons modeled in blender with material in Substance   My hard surface/box modeling skills are OKish enough to throw out/replace all the older models now I think. Expect many geometry/material updates before alpha starting with various props.
